00071 MH_ERROR sabmsg_log( void * userdata, SablotHandle sh, MH_ERROR code, 
00072         MH_LEVEL lev, char ** fields )
00073 {
00074 #if 0
00075         cerr << me << ": SLOG: ";
00076         while( *fields ) {
00077                 cerr << *fields << ';';
00078                 fields++;
00079         }
00080         cerr << '\n';
00081 #endif
00082         return 0;

00086 MH_ERROR sabmsg_error( void * userdata, SablotHandle sh, MH_ERROR code,
00087         MH_LEVEL lev, char ** fields )
00088 {
00089         cerr << me << ": SERR: ";
00090         while( *fields ) {
00091                 cerr << *fields << ';';
00092                 fields++;
00093         }
00094         cerr << '\n';
00095         return 0;
00096 }

00099 MessageHandler sabmsghan = {
00100     sabmsg_makecode,
00101     sabmsg_log,
00102     sabmsg_error
00103 };

00108 int main( int ac, char ** av )
00109 {   
00110     me = *av;
00111 
00112     SablotSituation sit;
00113     SablotHandle sh;
00114     if( SablotCreateSituation(&sit)
00115         || SablotCreateProcessorForSituation(sit, &sh)
00116         || SablotRegHandler(sh, HLR_MESSAGE, &sabmsghan, NULL ) ) {
00117             cerr << me << ": can't initialize Sablotron\n";
00118             return 111;
00119     }
00120    
00121     string xslt_dir(conf_home+"/share/freemail");
00122     string xslt_fn(xslt_dir+"/vqsignup1.xslt");
00123     
00124     ostringstream out;
00125     xslt_args_type xslt_args;
00126     try {
00127             out << ac_xmlstart.val_str() << endl;
00128             start( ac, av, out, cerr, xslt_args );
00129     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00130             cerr << *av << ": exception cougth: " << e.what() << endl;
00131             out.clear();
00132             out.str("");
00133             out << ac_xmlstart.val_str() << endl
00134                 << "<exception>" << e.what() << "</exception>" << endl;
00135     } catch( ... ) {
00136             cerr << *av << ": unknown exception\n";
00137             out.clear();
00138             out.str("");
00139             out << ac_xmlstart.val_str() << endl
00140                 << "<exception unexpected=\"1\"/>" << endl;
00141     }
00142 
00143     if( chdir(xslt_dir.c_str()) ) {
00144             cerr<<me<<": chdir to: "<<xslt_dir<<": "<<strerror(errno)<<endl;
00145             return 111;
00146     }
00147 
00148     if( ! xslt_args.empty() ) {
00149             xslt_args_type::const_iterator cur, end;
00150             for( cur=xslt_args.begin(), end=xslt_args.end(); cur!=end; ++cur ) {
00151                     if( SablotAddParam(sit, sh, cur->first.c_str(), 
00152                                 cur->second.c_str()) ) {
00153                         cerr<<me << ": can't set XSLT param: "<<cur->first
00154                             <<": "<<cur->second<<endl;
00155                     }
00156             }
00157                     
00158     }
00159     if( SablotAddArgBuffer(sit, sh, "xml", out.str().c_str())
00160         || SablotRunProcessorGen( sit, sh, xslt_fn.c_str(), "arg:/xml",
00161                 "file:///__stdout" ) ) {
00162             cerr << me << ": error while converting output\n";
00163             cerr << '"' << out.str().c_str() << '"' << endl;
00164             return 111;
00165     }
00166     return 0;
00167 }
